name: Dawes
descriptions: Dawes is a Powder Ganger who guards the NCR Correctional Facility entrance in 2281.
Dawes will grant access to the NCR Correctional Facility to a character who has a sufficient reputation with the Powder Gangers in exchange for 100 caps.

topics.response_text: {Prison under attack}There's still more troopers out there!
This? This is - or was - the big house. The New California Republic Correctional Facility. Not much "correcting" went on here, just slave labor.
{he does know}Well, I don't know. Depends on if you can make it worth my time. A hundred caps sounds right to me.
All right, you can go on in. Can't guarantee your safety, though. Just saying.

topics.topic_text: What did you do to end up in here?
topics.response_text: Me? I ran with the toughest gang in the Hub. You've heard of the Hub, right? It's, uh, west of here, I think, back in California.

topics.topic_text: If you're free, why are you sticking around?
topics.response_text: We've got the biggest, baddest fort in the wasteland. There's water and power, and if we need grub, we just go out and steal it.

topics.topic_text: What exactly is a Powder Ganger?
topics.response_text: That's us. We got sent here to fix the rails and make some new ones, and for that we got to use dynamite.

topics.topic_text: Who's in charge of the prison now?
topics.response_text: {Eddie alive}That'll be Eddie. You can usually find him sitting in the warden's old chair up in the main building.
